category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: VIS_expand_below_batch_size
preference.preference_description: Defines the batch size of BOM Lines to expand for all Teamcenter Visualization "Expand" operations. These operations expand the lines in each level in batches, with the batch size defined by this preference. A value of -1 indicates that there is no maximum batch size and that all lines in a single level will be processed in one batch. The default value is 50. This is a user preference.
